text: Ghost Rider (Daniel "Danny" Ketch) is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He is the third Marvel character to don the identity of Ghost Rider, after Johnny Blaze (the first supernatural Ghost Rider and brother to Danny) and the Western hero known as the Phantom Rider, who used the name in 1967. == In other media == A younger version of the character appeared in the 2012 movie Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance, portrayed by Fergus Riordan. Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Ghost Rider (Danny Ketch)
